dc:title: Day After Day - November 1941
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Renews opposition to peacetime conscription and urges readers to write the government, talk about it at meetings, and pray and do penance--"This program is open to us all." Enrolls her daughter in a "domestic science" school in Montreal. Includes a canticle of thanksgiving about little beauties in the city.
